channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Sheikh Azizul Hakim

item.title: On Reinventing the Wheel on Shoulder of Giants
item.description: Hence, I am making my personal portfolio, with almost nothing to showcase. Years ago, in high school, I thought myself a great deal of a writer. Actually, the things I wrote then still scares me. Form is temporary, class is permanent, they say. I am getting narcissistic, but that’s how I view my impressive past. I’d been an attentive science student in my secondary and higher secondary levels. We always do science on “shoulder of giants”.
